messages.content: Solve the following calculus problem: Find the derivative of f(x) = 3x^4 - 2x^3 + 5x - 7 and evaluate it at x=2.
Calculate the probability of drawing exactly 3 aces when randomly selecting 5 cards from a standard 52-card deck.
Help me solve this linear algebra problem: Find the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of the matrix [[4, 2], [1, 3]].
